parameters.name: InternalWSs
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| take 1
| parse IncidentUrl with * "/workspaces/" Workspace "/" *
| project Workspace

parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
summarize by subscriptionId
| project value = strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId, selected = iff(subscriptionId =~ '{InternalSub}', true, false)

parameters.name: Workspace
Severity
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| summarize Count = count(IncidentNumber) by Severity
| project Value = Severity, Label = strcat(Severity, ": ", Count)

parameters.name: Tactics
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| mvexpand Tactics to typeof(string)
| summarize Count=count(IncidentNumber) by Tactics
| project Value = Tactics, Label = strcat(Tactics, ": ", Count)

parameters.name: Owner
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend owner = tostring(Owner.assignedTo) 
| summarize Count=count(IncidentNumber) by Owner= case(owner=="", "Unassigned",owner)
| project Value = Owner, Label = strcat(Owner, ": ", Count)

parameters.name: Product
parameters.label: Product Name
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend Product = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0]) 
| summarize Count=count(IncidentNumber) by Product
| project Value = Product, Label = strcat(Product, ": ", Count)

parameters.name: resourceGroup
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| where id == "{Workspace:lable}"
| project resourceGroup

content.json:
The Incident Overview workbook is designed to assist in triaging and investigation by providing in-depth information about the incident, including:
* General information
* Entity data
* Triage time (time between incident creation and first response)
* Mitigation time (time between incident creation and closing)
* Comments

Customize this workbook by saving and editing it. 
You can reach this workbook template from the incidents panel as well. Once you have customized it, the link from the incident panel will open the customized workbook instead of the template.

parameters.name: IncidentID
parameters.label: Incident Name
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| where IncidentNumber == {IncidentNumber}
| take 1
| project IncidentName

parameters.name: RuleId
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| where IncidentNumber == {IncidentNumber}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, RelatedAnalyticRuleIds) by IncidentNumber
| project RelatedAnalyticRuleIds
parameters.label: Rule Id

content.json:
## Closing Classifications of Similar Incidents
Closing classifications of incidents that where created from the same rule in the past month

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where IncidentNumber == '{IncidentNumber}' 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,CreatedTime,Status, Severity, Owner, AdditionalData, IncidentUrl, Comments, Classification,ClassificationReason, ClassificationComment,Labels, Title, AlertIds) by IncidentNumber
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or '{Severity:label}' ==  "All"
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo), IncidentCreated = format_datetime(CreatedTime,'yy-MM-dd HH:mm')
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or '{Owner:label}' ==  "All"
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or '{Product:label}' ==  "All"
| extend Tags = extract_all('labelName":"(.*?)"',tostring(Labels))
| extend Owner = case(tostring(todynamic(Owner.assignedTo))=="", "Unassigned",tostring(todynamic(Owner.assignedTo))), Products = strcat_array(AdditionalData.alertProductNames, ", "), Alerts = tostring(AdditionalData.alertsCount), Bookmarks = tostring(AdditionalData.bookmarksCount), Comments = tostring(AdditionalData.commentsCount), Tactics = strcat_array(AdditionalData.tactics, ", "), Labels = strcat_array(Tags, ", ")
| mvexpand AlertIds to typeof(string)
| join kind=leftouter
(SecurityAlert
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,AlertName, Description, AlertType, Entities)by SystemAlertId) on $left.AlertIds == $right.SystemAlertId
| summarize AlertName = makelist(AlertName), AlertType = makelist(AlertType) by Comments, Labels, Title, Products, AlertsCount = Alerts, Bookmarks, Status, Severity, Owner, IncidentCreated, ClassificationComment, Classification, ClassificationReason 
| extend AlertNames = strcat_array(AlertName, ", "), AlertTypes = strcat_array(AlertType, ", ")
| project packed = pack_all()
| mv-expand packed
| parse tostring(packed) with * '"' Field '":"' Value '"}'
| where Field in ('Severity', 'Owner','Status', 'AlertsCount','Products','Title', 'IncidentCreated', 'Labels','Bookmarks', 'AlertNames', 'AlertsType', 'Classification','ClassificationComment','ClassificationReason')
| extend Field1 = case(Field== "IncidentCreated", "Time created", Field == "AlertsCount", "Alert count", Field == "ClassificationComment", "Classification Comment", Field == "ClassificationReason", "Classification Reason", Field == "AlertNames", "Alert Names", Field)
| extend Order = case(Field=="Title", 1,Field=="IncidentCreated", 2,Field=="Severity", 3,Field=="Status", 4,Field=="Owner", 5,Field=="Products", 6,Field=="AlertsType",6,Field=="AlertsCount", 7,Field=="Bookmarks", 8, Field=="Labels", 9,Field=="Classification", 10,Field=="ClassificationReason",11, 100)

content.noDataMessage: No recent closed incident were found

items.name: text - 2 - Copy - Copy - Copy - Copy - Copy

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or '{Severity:label}' ==  "All"
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or '{Tactics:label}' ==  "All"
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or '{Owner:label}' ==  "All"
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or '{Product:label}' ==  "All"
| where IncidentNumber == '{IncidentNumber}' or '{IncidentNumber}' ==  ''
| order by LastModifiedTime 
| project LastModifiedTime,IncidentNumber, Title, Product, IncidentUrl, ModifiedBy,Status, Severity
| take 250

SecurityIncident
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,Status, Severity, Owner, AdditionalData, IncidentUrl, Comments) by IncidentNumber
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or '{Severity:label}' ==  "All"
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or '{Tactics:label}' ==  "All"
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or '{Owner:label}' ==  "All"
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or '{Product:label}' ==  "All"
| where IncidentNumber == '{IncidentNumber}' or '{IncidentNumber}' ==  ''
| mvexpand Comments to typeof(string)
| extend Message = extract('message":"(.*?)"',1,tostring(Comments)), Author = extract('name":"(.*?)"',1,tostring(Comments)), CreatedTimeUTC = extract('createdTimeUtc":"(.*?)"',1,tostring(Comments))
| project CreatedTimeUTC, Author, Message
| take 250

content.json:
## Time to closure
The mean time between the incident creation and first modification by owner

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where IncidentNumber == '{IncidentNumber}' or '{IncidentNumber}' ==  ''
| where CreatedTime >= {TimeRange:start} and CreatedTime <= {TimeRange:end}
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or '{Severity:label}' ==  "All"
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or '{Tactics:label}' ==  "All"
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or '{Owner:label}' ==  "All"
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or '{Product:label}' ==  "All"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by IncidentNumber 
| where isnotnull(ClosedTime)
| extend TimeToClosure =  (ClosedTime - CreatedTime)/1h

content.json:
## Time to triage 
The mean time between the incident creation and first modification by owner

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where IncidentNumber == '{IncidentNumber}' or '{IncidentNumber}' ==  ''
| where CreatedTime >= {TimeRange:start} and CreatedTime <= {TimeRange:end}
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or '{Severity:label}' ==  "All"
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or '{Tactics:label}' ==  "All"
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or '{Owner:label}' ==  "All"
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or '{Product:label}' ==  "All"
| where ModifiedBy != 'Incident created from alert'
| summarize arg_max(LastModifiedTime,*) by IncidentNumber 
| where isnotnull(FirstModifiedTime)
| extend TimeToTriage =  FirstModifiedTime - CreatedTime
| project IncidentNumber, MeanToTriage = TimeToTriage/1h
